website_summaries.verdict: These quality-crafted highball glasses will add an element of elegance to your dining table.
pros: Crystalline glass is clear with a quality shine
The diamond pattern is eye-catching and doubles as a solid grip for the glass
Base of the glass is heavy with durable, thick sides
Enjoy trusted Waterford brand glasses at much lower cost
cons: Glasses are not real cut crystal so they have a thin seam

customer_reviews.title: I resisted because theses glasses are so freaking beautiful and it would have been a shame
customer_reviews.text: Well I can’t write a full review because I never got to use these cups. I bought them as a gift for my (now ex) boyfriend and he dumped me before I was able to use them. Although I wanted to smash each one on his face, I resisted because theses glasses are so freaking beautiful and it would have been a shame. So 5 stars for that. Although now that I think of it these cups are probably so strong they would have survived a hard throw...so maybe I should have went for it? Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend these glasses
customer_reviews.text: So some people are dogging these glasses because they have a seam and they are not hand-cut crystal, but I do think these are great glasses. They are thick and heavy and have the classic pattern work. Keep in mind that these are only $7.50/each. For that money you get no name glasses that could be very poor quality. This is the low-cost line of waterford but they look great and feel good and are much better than some of the others I tried to buy. I'll stick with these for regular use. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Enginepy

customer_reviews.title: the glasses are fine, however
customer_reviews.text: the glasses are fine, however, it required 4 shipments to get a set that did not have any broken glasses, I returned one set, received another set that had broken glasses and was told to not return those and then I was subsequently charged for them as they claimed I did return the broken items. I received another set that contained 2 broken glasses, and was also told not to return those therefore I was pleased with the glasses, but very displeased with the multiple shipments required to get a set of 8 unbroken glasses and then, was charged for glasses that were broken, but told NOT to return them So, overall, I am very displeased
customer_reviews.author: Henry H. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great item for Bourbon and keeping a grip and look very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bourbon glasses with a little grip! I like the fact that they are lead free (unlike my other crystal glasses) but look very nice and feel great. They work well with a large bourbon ice ball in them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Planoman

customer_reviews.title: Low quality glasses (I don't think they're made out of crystal)
customer_reviews.text: Like a reviewer before me noticed, this is a different quality than you would expect from crystal glasses (and different from what she ordered 20 years from the same manufacturer). I am pretty sure it's glass and not crystal. It sounds exactly like glass. The manufacturing is faulty, there are 3 seams on each glass and plenty of imperfections. They are not worth the price and in no way the 100$ original asking. My pictures show blemishes (these do not go off when washing). They are average or sub-par compared to similar glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Emil Lazar

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but visible seams
customer_reviews.text: For the ~$30 I paid, these are solid - Waterford crystal (albeit made in Italy, not Ireland), nice design/size - BUT you would never pay the $100 full price for these. There are visible seams (see pics) and you can find better in that price range (eg real Waterfords). I’m not spending high dollar for whiskey glasses so these are perfect for me but don’t expect standard Waterford quality and don’t pay full price!
customer_reviews.author: rchinasheville

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Waterford Hiball Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Crystal Waterfor Hiball Glasses ordered and received June 5, 2019 are being returned. Glasses have lines that reach the rim of the glass and appear even more breakable than those I've purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Woman

customer_reviews.title: Crystal should have a ring to it, these supposed glasses thump...UGH!!!
customer_reviews.text: Crystal should have a ring to it and a glass of this supposed quality should have weight to it. RETURNED. Boo to these low quality glasses.
customer_reviews.author: MsGinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice crystal glasses although not cut
customer_reviews.text: These are genuine Waterford crystal whisky glasses and look and feel great. They are relatively inexpensive because they are not cut crystal. However, honestly that will not matter all that much to most users. These are beautiful glasses with which you can serve or enjoy drinks with pride. Mine arrived in perfect condition. In fact I bought two sets; one for me and one for a gift. RJB.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J. BuffingtonTop Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: They just don’t make em like they used to!
customer_reviews.text: I received a more expensive set of crystal old fashioned glasses 20 years ago as a wedding gift. They are still as beautiful as the day I received them. In comparison, these new glasses are not nearly as beautiful or as durable as my old set. I already broke one. I no more than bumped it into my sink faucet when washing it and it broke in half right in my hand. They just don’t make em like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice for scotch or bourbon
customer_reviews.text: I like what I like and I like these glasses - drinking scotch or bourbon in these glasses is a pleasure - looks nice - more importantly, easy to hold - since I live by myself, 4 are probably more than I actually need but it allows me to switch out between drinks for a fresh glass - highly recommended - of course the snobs may not be impressed - everyone has a different taste in barware - this is my choice of a go to glass
customer_reviews.author: William Jones

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but - Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are truly gorgeous however, the way they come shipped is terrible! The first set arrived 50% broken with loose pieces of glass everywhere! The FREE replacement set arrived completely FINE! I think it’s more just hit or miss on how they arrive since the replacement box was packaged the same way. I bought these as a gift so, I rated “giftable” low since I had to wait additional time on a replacement! As long as you order way before you need them to allow time for a possible replacement then, they’re absolutely giftable! My gift arrived to my friend late.
customer_reviews.author: BSGY

customer_reviews.title: They will arrive broken, at least one glass.
customer_reviews.text: They are arrived with two glasses broken. The way they pack them is very dumb. They should put the packing tape around the actual glass instead of around the box that they are in. It’s foolish. They’re also very heavy thick glass, not delicate, but good price for what you get. Just know that there’s a very good chance yours will arrive broken as well until they change the way they ship them 🤪
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged - but beautiful product the second time around
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for the 1st time, and the item arrived broken, returned for a full refund, and the replacement arrived unscathed and beautiful. The packaging was extremely poor both times, with only a few of the large air pillows gathered to one side of the product box, inside of the packaging box from amazon. If you are ordering this as a gift, I would recommend ordering it far ahead of time in case this happens to you. \ Overall beautiful product - actual marquis waterford markham glasses - but poor shipping/packing. Otherwise very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good looking product!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice glasses for everyday use and also look good on a special occasion table. I recommend them as a very good value. Negative: I ordered two 4 glass sets. UPS delivered them in a box with the corner badly crushed but to my amazement they were not damaged. They were shipped in a box with substantial voids on three sides that would have only required some bubble pouches or popcorn. Very poor packing. Shipping clerk needs a few more weeks on the mop and broom before returning to shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jack J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These obviously look great, but also feel amazing in the hand - the perfect weight and balance. My guests have all been very complimentary of them. They look so good I keep them out and on display.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Broken bos
customer_reviews.text: The boxes, both inner and outer, were beat as if someone hit them with a bat. It actually looks intentional. I do not know if the glasses are broken, I didn't unwrap them since they are to be a gift. VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Whiskey Glass at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful glasses. Much more pleased than expected based on some of the reviews. The glasses are very substantial and a good weight. I was concerned about ordering glass from Amazon. In the past i have received numerous broken items, and i needed these glasses for a party we were hosting. They arrived the day after i ordered them with nothing broken. That said,they were not properly boxed or or in anyway protected.... I just got lucky. Moreover, the box didn’t even indicate to the shipper that the contents were fragile.
customer_reviews.author: MP from NY

customer_reviews.title: A touch of class to the home bar.
customer_reviews.text: These Waterford 'Marquis' crystal double Old Fashioned glasses are exactly what I needed to compliment my crystal decanters (soon to be filled with 'top shelf' sipping stuff like Scotch, Cognac and Bourbon. Only the best stuff will be going in these glasses! Good purchase. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Berry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glasses Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these tumblers. They are so beautiful and feel great in your hand. I will definitely be buying more. Mine arrived with no problems but I definitely see how the packing can leave them open to problems. The company needs to put a filling in the box to keep the inner box from bouncing around. Especially since the inner box is not the most sturdy of boxes as it is and there is no extra padding in it for the glasses. So I took a star away for the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: andrea hall

customer_reviews.title: Waterford = Quality !! But not in this case !!!
customer_reviews.text: Good for casual scotch, whiskey, whisky, bourbon. Grip is nice! Quality of the glass is okay-ish since it feels made of a plastic. The Waterford logo is clumsy and seam is very visible as well as one can feel. Maybe it’s knock-off? The packaging shows that grandma stored it for few decades and now gifting to grandkids - check the bottom of the box. I bought it for a gift, but then looking at bottom of the box, I bought something else to gift. It would be embarrassing after gifting and other side thinking that you have a used or knock-off product. Cheers !!
customer_reviews.author: PeNe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cut design
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beautifully cut and perfectly proportioned. They are easy to hold, a comfortable fit even for smaller hands. The most amazing thing - one glass arrived shattered so that evening I went to the Amazon site, printed the return label and sent the box of glasses back. The NEXT DAY I had four perfect glasses delivered to my door!
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful small crystal glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great wine (small beverage) glasses & great for entertaining tho you might need 2 sets depending on how many ppl you entertain I broke husbands last small wine glass recently & felt so bad so I bought him a set of these & they are great but will need 1 more set in future for social events
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dixon

customer_reviews.title: perfect glasses! Have to say that it saddened me ...
customer_reviews.text: My Waterford "style" has been Marquis ever since I toured their Ireland factory in the mid 90s...I have the entire collection of glasses and a few specialty items. Last week I bought a set of 4 Double Old Fashion for a young friend's 30th birthday coming up this weekend...he's learning to be a whiskey guy...perfect glasses! Have to say that it saddened me to learn Waterford closed that factory and relocated manufacturing operations to Eastern Europe...guess it actually returned home having been founded by a Czech immigrant in 1947. Love the "Seahorse" trademark!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to match a decanter by Waterford
customer_reviews.text: And a perfect match and a great price. Have no idea why a non drinker like myself loves glassware, just was raised to always offer company drinks I suppose. To always have it served nicely is a plus and the price was great if on a budget. Heavy, sturdy, and just all around nice drink glasses. Not really large for a manly man maybe, but just right for my home. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Poole

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses from Waterford Crystal
customer_reviews.text: These are highball glasses, not cut crystal, but made as a lower cost option from Waterford Crystal. They have a nice heft - a good weight and are thus not prone to chipping. They are attractive and I enjoy using them for more informal occasions. I think they are a very good quality. You should like them.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: Good solid glasses for home bar
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses for Old Fashioneds and other whiskey cocktails. They are sturdy and feel great in the hand. The detailing is very classy. I recently set up my home bar and I was looking for some affordable nice cocktail glasses and these really fit the bill. Mine were also very well packaged- there were no chips or broken glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kariannap

customer_reviews.title: These are molded glass, not cut.
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy, which is nice. The box they were in is thin, and one arrived broken. I was told to keep them. They are definitely molded with rounded edges on the "cut" part, not cut glass. I should have read more reviews first. I would have sent them back if needed for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and made in Italy(not China). Even though it isn't cut crystal, it's still stunning. Washes beautifully. Perfect weight and feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: JJJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap glasses not worth buying!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have about these glasses are that you can see the line where they fuse them together. That’s why the price is so cheap! Should of known you can’t get a Waterford glasses for cheap! They will do for everyday use. At least I won’t cry when these break unlike my other Waterford glasses that cost $175 for two glasses. You can tell the difference big time
customer_reviews.author: Opleaz- Michael

customer_reviews.title: Poor substitute for the real thing.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the seam is easily visible on these glasses, and two arrived broken. Plus, the sticker said "Made in Italy." Last I heard, Waterford was in Ireland! I guess Waterford has a factory in Italy for their cheaper crystal glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jeffrey S. Appel

customer_reviews.title: High quality glassware
customer_reviews.text: These are ideal glasses and resist etching and chipping. Nice and heavy and perfect circumference for a variety of hand sizes. Plus they are elegant enough for dressing up the table but not too elegant for every day use. The price is just right for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Quality glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband and he loves them!! They have a nice weight to it and they look dazzling when the light hits it. I am very careful when I clean these because I read the reviews and do not want this to break. I definitely recommend this as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Fragile beauty
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these goblets. I just hope Amazon will be careful with shipping them. They definitely came with broken bits on the first try. But, when I got them undamaged I was so happy. They are my favorite ever. No other goblet compares in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Sequeira

customer_reviews.title: Durability and appearance 😊
customer_reviews.text: We like good glasses. These were perfect. Heavy weight and one didn’t break when it was accidentally knocked over. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value, Looks and Feels Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how nice these are for the price tag. I read some reviews that worried me, people complaining about lines in the glass and things like that. Mine came in perfect and I don't see any flaws whatsoever. I'm certainly not a glass aficionado but I think these are awesome. They have a really nice weight and the design gives a good grip. I actually haven't used mine yet because I'm on an alcohol cleanse which is the only reason I give 4 stars. I have them sitting on my bar and they look amazing. Will update review in a month when I use them to drink my favorite whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful , no seams and sturdy all occasion glasses
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sturdy , artistic , and no seams ! Well worth the money ! Made by Waterford so has a great name and it is proudly shown.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Good Value at $25/Glass
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are by Waterford; the Marquis line. It was clear to me that these were NOT "Waterford Top-of-Line; however, they are very serviceable and a good value at the $25/glass I paid, before tax. I have not had them long enough to rate Durability.
customer_reviews.author: JazcoN

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a set of four of these glasses. Once received, one if the glasses had a chip which turned into a long crack. We contacted Amazon, and they sent another set of four at no charge. When we received the second set at least one of the glasses had a small crack in the top of the glass. I mean crack when I say it, I am not referring to the seams of the glass. Quality control from the manufacturer is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... set of glasses are heavy and sparkly and really beautiful. Unfortunately one of them was chipped on arrival
customer_reviews.text: This set of glasses are heavy and sparkly and really beautiful. Unfortunately one of them was chipped on arrival. It happens. The best part is that customer service said they would make it right and replace my glass. And they did immediately. No chips this time. My glasses are beautiful and I would feel very confident ordering from this vendor again as their customer service is as exceptional as my new Waterford glasses.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beautiful. The crystal is a tiny bit thick ( if that makes sense?) for my taste. However since most of my expensive wedding crystal has broken (still going strong 27yrs💪🏼) I wanted a complete set. this is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: N- Rod

customer_reviews.title: This is **NOT** Waterford Crystal - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Waterford evokes emotions of fine hand cut lead crystal. This is regular commercial glass of very average quality. You can buy similar products for $15 to $20 for 4. Why pay an exorbitant amount for the Waterford brand. Packaging was poor - 1 glass was broken when I received the package. It just is not worth the money to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sunderlal

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I love using my new glasses! Like others have stated, you will still be able to see/feel a seam in the glasses, but I still find them a very attractive vessel for red wine, cocktails, sparkling water, ect. (I bought the white wine glasses, but do find myself using the mostly for cocktails or red wine.)
customer_reviews.author: sasicign

customer_reviews.title: Warrior's Best
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality glasses, exactly what I would expect of Waterford crystal. They are easy to hold, have an 8 oz capacity, and are very elegant. I will purchase these glasses again soon.
customer_reviews.author: J Lake

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Also not the worst, but not at all what is expected from Waterford. As others have mentioned, the seams are VERY visible. There are many imperfections in the glass. I am returning. I purchased a similar pattern from Riedel & they are far superior to these & dishwasher safe (these are not).
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They’re thicker so you can tell they’re not the more expensive variety but because of the thickness I feel they are way more durable. It’s a nice thing to bust out when you don’t want to break your nicer set.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Miles

customer_reviews.title: Waterford, but affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a decent set of tumblers for my kitchen, and these popped up. They're quite affordable, are sharp enough to use for guests, but durable enough to actually be used for just family as well.
customer_reviews.author: klvinci

customer_reviews.title: Great, BUT Beware the big difficult-to-remove sticker
customer_reviews.text: Nice!. Waterford so that's a given. Only problem was one of the glasses had a big white sticker on the bottom that was very difficult to get off! why do they do that??!!.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Good price for these glasses. I run them through the dishwasher all the time and no problems. It's not fine crystal so I don't mind if they get blemished over time. After a year of use they still look good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nakayama

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and weight of them. Waterford carries other Marquis crystal pieces that match these glasses so it is a current pattern which is nice. I am very happy with these, especially for what I paid for them. No flaws that I found with the ones I received.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses as a gift for my husband. He likes it .The glass has a nice weight and is actually very pretty. They feel great in the hand. He uses this glass every time he and whiskey。
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Yu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as a gift, when I opened the box to examine them, I was in awe of the beautiful design. I know they are the lower level of Waterford, but they certainly don't look it. I would highly recommend these for any household. Hope this helps!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Buniva

customer_reviews.title: Great experience with JAF
customer_reviews.text: High quality glasses with classic beauty. Durable without losing the Waterford signature good looks. An affordable bargain with JAF. I highly recommend doing business with JAF. My husband and I would not hesitate to purchase with JAF in the future. Thank you Amazon for making this purchase possible.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: We even put them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend, a fan of old fashioneds. We both love them. They are much better than the first gift - just one glass with etched in mountains for the same price. I ended up returning it and getting this set instead. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful! I actually bought these to use as juice glasses, and they are perfect . Mine arrived carefully packaged, and in perfect condition. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: D. puente

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, wanted glasses with no seams, but these have several, although they are not very noticeable. One of the four came with the tiniest of chips at the top edge. Carefully drank out of that glass to test if it would be dangerous to touch with my lips. Seems fine. Sturdy and elegant. Currently shopping for more Marquis by Waterford items.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Peck

customer_reviews.title: Buy them! you will not regret it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he is bourbon guy. He loves this glasses. Easy to hold and very sparkling. They look luxurious and it’s been two months or more he’s using them and they look the same, no scratches, nothing. Hand wash recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Alina

customer_reviews.title: Look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how these become so highly ranked. They look cheap. One was broken on arrival due to incredibly poor packing. I returned them and ordered something better,
customer_reviews.author: Dr Hyde

customer_reviews.title: A Really Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a gift for my son-in-law. I wasn't sure if he would like them or use them. Well, I didn't have to worry. According to my "inside source," my daughter, he really likes them and uses them every time he's got company. It is a nice looking, old-fashion sized glass that has some weight to it. Knowing that they're being used by my son-in-law is my litmus test. I'm glad I bought them and would do it all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerMike M. from Dallas, PA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - excellent value! Watch the price, it changes from the time we bought them. They are well worth more though! Great housewarming gift. They hold up in the dishwasher and feel high-end.
customer_reviews.author: The Simple Baby Life

customer_reviews.title: and he loved them! They are beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband's birthday, and he loved them! They are beautiful in person, so fancy looking!! Nice thickness, you don't feel like you're going to break them from holding them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Waterford crystal is expensive. This is a great deal on a fantastic product. The glasses are weighted correctly and hold the temperature better than a thinner knockoff. A perfect glass for spirits that demand this level of excellence.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deal for
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are an amazing deal. My mother always used Waterford for special occasions when I was a kid, and when I moved out to live on my own, I needed something similar. These glasses feel substantial in your hand, and really gave my that "special" feeling I wanted. Most importantly, at this price, there is no way you can pass these up.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Alton

customer_reviews.title: One glass broken
customer_reviews.text: One glass broken. Otherwise, love the other 3. I dont have time to deal with returning a damaged shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly as usual and I couldn't wait to use them. These are super high quality, have a solid feel and are a pleasure to use. Excellent value and will certainly be getting other glasses of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMom

customer_reviews.title: The only way to enjoy an Irish whiskey or Scotch on the rocks
customer_reviews.text: The only way to enjoy an Irish whiskey or Scotch on the rocks. Viewing classic movies or touring estates in travel shows you see glasses like these all the time. Heavy crystal with a nice heft; the best way to savor classic spirits. They arrived in perfect condition and have the perfect cuttings to catch the light. Recommended for a satisfying sip of your favorite single malt or blend.
customer_reviews.author: Cort Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good pick
customer_reviews.text: These Markham glasses are not what I expected. These are not the quality and classic looks I expected from Waterford. The fit is also more geared toward a women’s hand size , it’s rather small. It is a nice glass just not a substitute for a Brookside by wf. ..
customer_reviews.author: j.s.

customer_reviews.title: just something nice about drinking bourbon from crystal
customer_reviews.text: My new go-to bourbon glass... just something nice about drinking bourbon from crystal. For the price, they are nice. No seam lines on the ones I received. The Waterford etch on the bottom wears quickly, but then, I am also not running around saying "look at my Waterford".
customer_reviews.author: Helios

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy glasses that are obviously cheap enough (seams are ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy glasses that are obviously cheap enough (seams are very visible) that I won't mind too much if one breaks. Not exactly what I thought I was ordering until I realized it's the economy Waterford line and is not actually crystal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what he was looking for to drink whiskey. Crystal, large size, comfortable to hold in a larger hand, reasonably priced, and look good. My smaller hands find these harder to hold (glove size small, 7) We hand wash to keep them from getting scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Smelly SmingsleyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Also, the weight is great. Not a cheap feeling/ looking glass. I can’t wait to use them this holiday season!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Makes a lovely gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a Christmas gift with a nice bottle of scotch. They are sturdy and weighted nicely. They feel and look very expensive. Great gift for a scotch or whiskey lover.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these and are holding up great to having old fashioneds made in them regularly. they look great and are nice and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Dimmelus

customer_reviews.title: Fancy looking glasses that don't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. I get a lot of compliments on them from guests. Heavy and reasonably thick with a nice pattern. If you watch The Tick on Amazon streaming these glasses make an appearance or two (I did not buy them because of this, but noticed afterward).
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: SIZE IS INACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups, they look very pretty. I don't see any seams or imperfections like others claim. However, they are 8-9 oz, not nearly 12oz like the product page claims.
customer_reviews.author: William Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Lifestyles of the rich and famous
